text: Isirayila mangɛ naxa Yehosafati yaabi, «Xɛmɛ keren peti nan be, won nɔma Alatala maxɔrinde naxan saabui ra, kɔnɔ a mu rafan n ma, barima a gbaloe fe nan gbansan falama n ma fe ra. A mu xun nakeli fe yo falama n bɛ. A xili Mike. Yimila xa di na a ra.» Yehosafati naxa a fala, «A mu lanma mangɛ xa yi wɔyɛn mɔɔli fala.»
